Test Name: Hereditary Erythrocytosis Mutation Analysis, Whole Blood
Purpose: To identify genetic mutations associated with hereditary erythrocytosis (familial polycythemia) in whole blood specimens, ensuring accurate and reliable diagnostic results.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermocycler, agarose gel electrophoresis system, UV transilluminator, sequencing platform (NGS or Sanger), spectrophotometer/fluorometer, laboratory computer
